mainText:
I've just heard this news just less then an hour ago and I feel empty Steve
was my role model. He's revolutionized this world's technology I doubt we
will see a man as great as him. I heard the news and I doubted it I felt
like I was in a nightmare and still am. I'm sad and wherever Steve is I hope
he is well I had a vision to work with him but my vision is to meet his
expectations I'm still young and even though he has passed away I feel he's
motivating me still
author: Grendel
